detail_desc: Paper straw hat with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Short dress in lace made from recycled polyester with a scallop-trimmed V-neck. Concealed zip at the back, long sleeves, and a seam at the waist. Lined.
Loafers in imitation patent leather with a fringed strap across the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and chunky soles. Platform front 3.5 cm, heel approx. 5 cm.
High-waisted trousers in sturdy jersey in a narrow cut at the top with pleats, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, and wide, super-flared legs.
Short shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, and side pockets.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar with beaded appliqués, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Oversized shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a large chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a low-cut neckline.

Jacket in washed denim with a collar, zip down the front and long, cuffed sleeves with a zip. Welt side pockets, inner pockets and flap chest pockets with a button. Adjustable tab and buttons at the sides. Unlined.
Vest top in cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline, deep armholes with raw edges, and short slits in the sides.
Small imitation leather shoulder bag with fringing and small printed text on the front, a braided shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size 15x19 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs.
Off-the-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Set with a hair donut and six hair pins with appliqués.

Baby Exclusive. Down all-in-one suit with a detachable, jersey-lined hood and diagonal zip that continues down one leg. Ribbing around the neckline cuffs and hem and a contrasting colour lining. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Linen joggers with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Thin metal hoop earrings. Diameter 4.7 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in checked twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem.
Pile-lined biker jacket in leather with a pile collar, tab with a press-stud at the neck, zip down the front and side pockets.
Dress in striped cotton seersucker with a collar, buttons at the top and butterfly sleeves. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Lined hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short-sleeved blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and along the yoke at the back.
Cropped vest top in soft cotton jersey.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in soft, patterned organic cotton slub jersey. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Short-sleeved shirt in a printed viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.

Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, a lace frill at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back. Side support and a silicone trim.
Skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and an elasticated waist. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Short shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and decorative lace trims at the front and hems.
Pyjama bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and tapered legs.

Calf-length kaftan dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Gently tapered waist with pleats front and back and a detachable tie belt, and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Striped, long-sleeved top in sturdy cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, a small chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Briefs in soft cotton jersey with wide, visible elastic at the waist and a lined gusset.
Jacket in woven fabric with a chest pocket and flap welt pockets at the front. Imitation suede elbow patches, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a polo neck, dropped shoulders, fully fashioned sleeves, a ribbed collar and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.

Off-the-shoulder maxi dress in soft viscose jersey with a heavy drape. Short sleeves, elastication and a wide flounce at the top, an elasticated seam below the bust and gently flared skirt with high slits at the front. Unlined.

Padded jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood and zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastener down the front. Zipped chest pocket, elasticated cuffs, reflective details and a fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Balconette lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, felted fabric edge, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Zip in one side and welt seams around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with a collar and concealed press-studs on the shoulders. Sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.

Long-sleeved circus costume in soft velour with a V-neck, concealed zip at the back and fringed epaulettes. Glittery elastication at the cuffs, decorative buttons at the front and a peplum that divides at the back.
Non-wired push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in soft cotton twill. Relaxed fit with notch lapels and a loose yoke at the back, on one side at the front. Buttoned shoulder tabs, long sleeves with a tab and buckle at the cuffs, a soft, detachable belt and diagonal welt pockets at the front. Lined.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned linen and cotton weave in a relaxed fit with a resort collar. French front, chest pocket and a straight-cut hem.
Metal hair clips in various designs. Three with pearly plastic beads, one with sparkly plastic beads and one plain one. Length approx. 6 cm.
Short lace dress with a V-neck front and back, short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Boxy-style T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Slip-on trainers in imitation leather with embroidery, elastic gores in the sides and a lightly padded edge. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Iron-on fabric name tags in various colours to attach to your belongings. Size approx. 1.2x4 cm.

Leggings in washed superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details with patches on the inside. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Top in softly draping jersey with a sheen. V-neck with a wide lace trim, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with worn details, a high waist, button fly and straight legs.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a soft silky feel. High waist with a concealed zip in one side and a gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.
Metal brooch in the shape of a face decorated with sparkly stones in different colours. Pin on the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with decorative sequins at the front of the neckline.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length 43-50 cm.
Ankle-length jersey trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Blouse in airy plumeti chiffon with a lace-trimmed collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a small flounce at the shoulders. Seam at the top with decorative gathers, and long sleeves with a frill trim and button at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Short top in an airy weave with a sheen. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the top.
Top in sturdy, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs with jersey ribbing at the hems.
Shorts in a soft cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Short skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, slit at the front of the hem and zip at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in washed stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Metal rings in various designs, decorated with plastic rhinestones.

Short dress woven in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell blend with a deep V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and a pleated skirt. Short puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning and a frill trim. V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Ankle-length trousers in pleated jersey with a sheen. High waist with wide, covered elastication and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles. Platform approx. 6 cm.
Puffer jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets, covered elastication at the cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.
